header_text: You are at an amusement park on the weekend with friends. They all go to the highest ride in the park, and you are assigned to sit in the front. Soon, the ride starts, and you feel excited.

elements.Text: Is it fun to go on a new roller coaster?

elements.name: You are at an amusement park on the weekend with friends. They all go to the highest ride in the park, and you are assigned to sit in the front. Soon, the ride starts, and you feel excited. _Physical Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
